name: BetFury
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: BetFury (https://betfury.io/) is the Social i-Gaming Crypto platform with multicurrency daily Staking payouts. The platform differs by the full cycle of own game development, as well as the development of various sub-services. BetFury has its own token BFG launched on BSC. Our team is interested in creating a bigger, profitable, successful, and enjoyable platform for everyone.
